column5: I am going to be on Lake Erie later this week & I want to fish the Canada side. Where on Pelee Island can I buy a License?? I will need to know the location of the place, because I will be getting there by boat from the Ohio Side. So if you can help, Please give as much information as possible. Thanks all John
there is a little diner in the marina area that sell fishing licenses on Pelee. The other marina also has a store that sells them. Have caught many Bass just outside the marinas. Mac man
